comment: Great teacher, clear and concise.  Knows the subject matter.  Good in handling student issues. Work to make class a good learning experience.  Take notes and complete all your project.  Most students get angry because she will not let you complete work you put off; however, she is understanding with personal issues.
A good teacher - if you want to learn. Good information, knowledgeable.  Easy to talk to and work out isues.  She is there for students.
Great class - you learn so much about diversity.  She makes you think.
Liked the class a lot.  Helpful and nice.  Likes to talk.
You will like the class. The activities and assignment are interesting and organized.  You really learn a lot about yourself. You will enjoy this professor.
Good teacher.  Give you her time. You have to do the work or you want like this class.  All assignments are on-line and organized. Lots of fun in this class.
Good teacher; thorough;and organized. Do take her if you do come to class and complete assignments.
I really liked her. You will not if you do not want to attend class.  She is very thorough.  A fun class.

Horrible teacher. Her tests were unclear and some of the questions made no sense. However, they were online which helped. The class discussions were interesting, but only because the class made them interesting. She makes weird noises all during class. We did pointless book work all the time, I felt like I was in middle school.
Excellent, love her stories.
Good, helpful.  Lots of work which most people hate.  Class discussions are interesting. I like her and the course.
Good professor.  Enjoyed the class, but tests were very hard.  I failed most of them, but still made an A.  Just do all the work and come to class and get an A!
This class is so boring! Actually all the education classes are boring at KSU. You will need to buy the textbook. Its an easy A though if you do the assignments and attend class.

I really liked this professor. Class discussions were lead by the students, which makes it interesting. If you miss 2 or less classes you don't have to take the final. Tests were a little rough at the beginning, but since our class was doing poorly on them she put in a curve and made them easier. Lots of presentations and homework.

Doesn't teach and all the questions on the test are from the book that we don't use in class. You basically teach yourself everything, and you never know when anything is due. She gives unfair grades on her tests.

Very sweet lady but not organized or clear on anything.  You have to ask lots of questions to figure out what is due when and then she looks at you like you are stupid.  EASY A though!  Several group projects.  Lots of class participation so be prepared to get called on and talk.

Dr. Levert is very sweet and she tried hard to work with you but she is never clear on due dates or expectations. The tests are mostly online so you can use your book and power points during the exam. Even though she is never clear on due dates if you explain that she was unclear she usually extends the dates.

Terrible teacher. She does not clearly explain anything. Her test are harder than they should be. Trying to communicate with her is nearly impossible. She is a nice person, but terrible teacher and made class way harder than it needed to be. I would not take her!!!!

Professor just read powerpoints which are posted on Vista. Did not seem knowledgeable of content. 3 Group projects. A LOT of busywork. Professor not clear on assignments or due dates. Email responses from professor "ok" or "thanks" with no resolution to problems/issues. Tests are filled with spelling errors and harder than they should be.

Just don't. She's terribly frustrating. I almost changed my major to just history because she presented such a bad light on the teaching department. Not organized, not smart, not clear in what is expected, just all around disappointing and frustrating for a class that is easy, common sense, and very redundant.

She is very confusing and you have to ask question several times to get your answer. There are a lot of assignments but none of them are very hard. The most unclear thing is about when assignments are due. She's okay, not top recommended.
DO NOT TAKE HER. ISNT CLEAR ON ANYTHING. IF YOU EMAIL HER YOUR RESPONSE WILL BE "OK". NEVER GOES OVER CHAPTERS. EXPECTS YOU TO LEARN THINGS ON YOUR OWN. DO NOT TAKE HER
She never has any idea whats going on. I didn't buy the text book and I did just fine. She's ridiculously unorganized but it's an easy A.

Very all over the place, never remembered what she would tell you from one class to another. Horrible administrative skills, you will be in the dark about most due dates and your grade. Never responded to emails until about 5th or 6th day.  Stay away from this teacher at all cost! I believe that her PhD (Pilled Higher and Deeper)definitely applies!

Very unclear about when assignments are due and the textbook is not at all necessary to buy. Extremely interesting and easy class. Just keep up with all of your assignments. If you only miss one or no days of class, you are exempt from the final. The only other test to take is the mid term. Loved this class:) Especially because I made a 97%:)
